pageContext.claim: “Through our Pledge to American Workers, we've secured private-sector commitments to provide 6.5 million new jobs and training opportunities. And that also is an absolute, total record.”
pageContext.analysis: The advisory board Trump is referencing says nearly 200 companies have pledged to offer more than 6.5 million training opportunities to workers over the next five years. It's not a mix of jobs and training opportunities, as Trump claims, it's just training. Many of the companies had already pledged to offer these training programs before Trump's "Pledge to American Workers" came along.
